Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Oversea \O"ver*sea"\, Overseas \O"ver*seas"\, adv. Over the sea; abroad. --Milton. --Tennyson. [1913 Webster]

overseas adj 1: in a foreign country; "markets abroad"; "overseas markets" [syn: {abroad}] 2: being or passing over or across the sea; "some overseas trade in grain arose" [syn: {oversea}] adv 1: beyond or across the sea; "He lived overseas for many years" [syn: {oversea}] 2: in a place across an ocean [syn: {beyond the sea}, {over the sea}, {abroad}]
